title: All Dressed Chips
americanized: Ridgies chips has their own version of all dressed chips. They're alright, but you'll have to visit Canada for the real deal.
definition: Only the best chip flavour on the planet. The flavour is a combination of ketchup, barbecue sauce, sour cream & onion, and salt & vinegar. What more could you want.

title: Bagged Milk
definition: Bagged milk is exactly what it sounds like. A plastic bag that contains milk. One of the corners is cut out to allow the milk to pour out. The bag is typically stored in a pitcher or jug. YUM.

title: BeaverTail
definition: Fried dough pastries, stretched to resemble the shape of a beaver's tail, with various toppings added on top. If you don't get Nutella on top, then what are you doing? Unless you're allergic to nuts, then go for The Classic.

title: Butter Tart
americanized: The closest equivalent would be pecan pie.
definition: A very popular dessert in Canada. he sweet tart consists of a filling of butter, sugar, syrup, and egg, baked in a pastry shell until the filling is semi-solid with a crunchy top. Don't sleep on butter tarts.

title: Chirp
definition: To make fun of someone. You should be chirped if you don't know what chirped means.

title: Coffee Crisp
americanized: They don't exist in the United States HAHAHA you'll have to visit Canada.
definition: A Canadian chocolate bar consisting of alternating layers of vanilla wafer and a foamed coffee-flavoured soft candy, covered with a milk chocolate outer layer.

title: Dart
definition: A cigarette. A common phrase using this term is hack a dart

title: Dep
definition: Short for dépanneur, the term for a convenience store in the French-speaking province Quebec.

title: Double Double
americanized: A coffee with 2 creams and 2 sugars.
definition: A common way for a Canadian to order their coffee — double cream, double sugar. Typically from Tim Hortons ♥

title: Eh
definition: On its own or added to the end of a sentence, it can mean ‘right?’, ‘what?’, but can also be added to most sentences just for a good time.

title: Freezie
definition: A nostalgic summertime treat consisting of ice, sugar, and food-coloring that comes in a clear plastic tube. Red is the best flavor. End of discussion

title: GTs
definition: GTs is short for good times, not gin & tonics
